item.title: 美联储委员沃勒：1月就业数据表现强劲，若此趋势延续，暂停政策调整或为明智之举
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒表示，若即将公布的2月就业数据显示美国劳动力市场在2025年疲软后已"转向更稳固的基础"，他愿意在美联储3月会议上维持利率不变。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said he was open to leaving interest rates on hold at the Fed's March meeting if upcoming February jobs data indicates the U.S. labor market had "pivoted to a more solid footing" after a weak 2025.】

item.title: 荷兰国际集团报告称，美元已丧失部分避险货币地位
item.description: 荷兰国际集团周一在一份报告中指出，自2024年以来，美元作为避险货币的部分价值已有所减弱，但并非全部丧失。不过该机构同时表示，尚未观察到全球对美元需求的普遍恶化。【原文：The dollar has lost some, but not all, of its safe-haven value since 2024, ING said in note on Monday, adding however, that it saw no broad deterioration in global demand for the US currency.】

item.title: 吉利德将以最高78亿美元收购癌症疗法开发商Arcellx
item.description: 吉利德科学公司周一宣布，将斥资高达78亿美元收购其合作伙伴Arcellex，这是该公司自2020年以来规模最大的交易，旨在强化其抗癌药物产品线。【原文：Gilead Sciences will pay as much as $7.8 billion to acquire its partner Arcellex in its largest deal since 2020, the biopharma company said on Monday, as it looks to strengthen its lineup of cancer treatments.】

item.title: 特朗普再度抨击美国最高法院，誓言加征关税并限制许可证发放
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普在最高法院上周裁定其大规模关税计划违宪后，再次谴责该法院，并誓言将动用其他关税权力和许可，但未透露具体细节。【原文：President Donald Trump renewed his condemnation of the U.S. Supreme Court after it ruled against his sweeping tariff program last week, vowing to turn to other tariff powers and licenses but giving no details.】

item.title: 美国将就印度、印尼和老挝产太阳能电池板作出关税决定
item.description: 美国商务部将于周一公布初步裁决，决定是否对从印度、老挝和印度尼西亚进口的太阳能电池及组件征收反补贴税。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department on Monday will reveal a preliminary decision on whether to impose anti-subsidy duties on solar cells and panels imported from India, Laos and Indonesia.】

item.title: 晨间竞标：至高不确定性
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 据Axios报道，美国国防部长赫格塞斯召见Anthropic公司首席执行官，就克劳德人工智能在军事领域的应用展开严厉交涉。
item.description: 据Axios周一援引消息人士报道，美国国防部长皮特·赫格塞斯已于周二召见人工智能公司Anthropic首席执行官达里奥·阿莫代至五角大楼，预计将就该公司克劳德人工智能工具的军事用途展开可能较为严厉的会谈。【原文：U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has summoned artificial intelligence company Anthropic's CEO Dario Amodei to the Pentagon on Tuesday for what is expected to be potentially tough talks over the military use of Anthropic's Claude artificial intelligence tool, Axios reported on Monday, citing sources.】

item.title: 诺和诺德股价暴跌，试验受挫令韦戈维时代最后涨幅化为乌有
item.description: 诺和诺德股价周一暴跌逾15%，抹去了此前Wegovy上市带来的全部涨幅。此前这家制药公司表示，其新一代减肥药CagriSema在临床试验中表现逊于礼来公司的tirzepatide。【原文：Novo Nordisk shares fell more than 15% on Monday, wiping away the last gains Wegovy's launch had brought, after the drugmaker said its next-generation obesity drug CagriSema underperformed Eli Lilly's tirzepatide in a trial.】

item.title: 英国隐私监管机构在联合声明中对人工智能生成的图像发出警告
item.description: 英国隐私监管机构周一与数十个国际监管机构发表联合声明，对人工智能生成的图像表示担忧——这些图像未经当事人同意便描绘了可识别身份的个体。【原文：Britain's privacy watchdog published a joint statement with dozens of international authorities on Monday, setting out concerns over images generated by artificial intelligence which depict identifiable individuals without their consent.】

item.title: 默克将设立独立癌症业务部门以弥补Keytruda专利到期损失
item.description: 默克公司周一宣布，将把人类健康业务拆分为两个部门，将其由Keytruda主导的重磅抗癌业务与非肿瘤药物业务分开。【原文：Merck said on Monday it will split its human-health business into two divisions, separating its blockbuster cancer franchise led by Keytruda from its non-oncology medicines.】

item.title: 瑞士表示仍致力于与美国达成具有法律约束力的贸易协议
item.description: 瑞士政府周一表示，该国仍计划通过与美国的谈判促成一项具有法律约束力的协议，旨在最终敲定2025年底达成的初步协议——该协议将美国对瑞士商品的关税从39%降至15%。【原文：Switzerland still plans to broker a legally-binding agreement from talks with the United States aimed at finalising a preliminary deal struck in late 2025 that cut U.S. tariffs on Switzerland to 15% from 39%, the government said on Monday.】

item.title: 印度电信公司巴蒂电信将投资22亿美元扩大数字贷款业务
item.description: 印度第二大移动运营商巴蒂电信周一宣布，未来几年将向旗下金融部门投资2000亿卢比（约合22亿美元），以加速推进数字贷款业务。【原文：Bharti Airtel will invest 200 billion rupees ($2.2 billion) in its financial arm over the next few years, India's second-largest mobile carrier by number of users said on Monday, as it steps up its push into digital lending.】

item.title: 必胜客美国销售额超预期，优惠活动吸引精打细算的顾客
item.description: 达美乐披萨周一公布的美国第四季度同店销售额超出华尔街预期，这家快餐连锁企业以价值驱动的促销活动和新菜品推动了需求增长。【原文：Domino's Pizza beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter U.S. same-store sales on Monday, as the fast-food chain's value-driven promotions and new menu items fueled demand.】

item.title: 吉利德以78亿美元收购Arcellx
item.description: 吉利德科学公司周一宣布将收购癌症疗法开发商Arcellx，交易隐含股权价值达78亿美元，推动Arcellx股价在盘前交易中飙升77.8%至113.99美元。【原文：Gilead Sciences said on Monday it will buy cancer therapy developer Arcellx for an implied equity value of $7.8 billion, sending shares of Arcellx climbing 77.8% to $113.99 in premarket trading.】

item.title: 焦点：人工智能威胁企业生存，软件公司面临更高借贷成本和更严格审查
item.description: 行业消息人士称，软件公司正推迟债务融资交易，因借贷成本上升及贷款方审查趋严给该行业带来压力，而人工智能带来的日益增长的压力则威胁着其商业模式。【原文：Software companies are delaying debt deals as higher borrowing costs and tougher scrutiny from lenders weigh on the sector, at a time when mounting pressure from artificial intelligence threatens their business models, industry sources said.】

item.title: 汽车制造商正推动实现"无需注视"的驾驶技术，引发安全与责任归属的争议
item.description: 汽车制造商正朝着实现完全无人驾驶汽车的漫长征程中一个关键里程碑全力冲刺：开发出允许驾驶员将视线移离道路——无论是发短信还是敲击笔记本电脑——的系统，除非车辆发出警报要求其重新接管控制权。【原文：Automakers are racing toward a key milestone on the long road to fully driverless cars: systems that let drivers take their eyes off the road – to shoot a text or peck away on a laptop – unless the car alerts them to retake control.】

item.title: 美国最高法院将审理埃克森公司向古巴索赔案
item.description: 美国最高法院将于周一审议一项法律的适用范围，该法律允许美国企业就古巴没收财产寻求赔偿。此案涉及埃克森美孚公司和邮轮运营商，正值特朗普政府加大对古巴政府施压之际。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court will consider on Monday the scope of a law that lets American companies seek compensation for property seized by Cuba in cases involving ExxonMobil and cruise operators being argued at a time when President Donald Trump's administration is ramping up pressure on the Cuban government.】

item.title: 华尔街期货下跌，关税疑虑打击风险偏好
item.description: 美国股市期货周一走低，因关税不确定性再度升温令投资者感到不安。此前尽管最高法院裁定推翻了特朗普总统更广泛的关税措施，但特朗普仍宣布将对部分商品加征15%的关税。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Monday as renewed tariff uncertainty unnerved investors after President Donald Trump announced a new 15% duty despite a Supreme Court ruling that struck down his broader levies.】

item.title: 威普罗首席技术官表示人工智能是机遇而非威胁
item.description: 印度威普罗公司高管表示，人工智能的快速普及将推动软件服务供应商需求增长而非萎缩，此言反驳了该技术将威胁行业外包模式的担忧。【原文：India's Wipro expects rapid AI adoption to boost rather than shrink demand for software service providers, a top executive said, countering concerns that the technology threatens the industry's outsourcing model.】

item.title: 瑞士工业团体称特朗普最新关税上调加剧混乱局面
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普上周末宣布将所有国家对美出口商品的临时关税从10%提高至15%，此举引发了更多混乱。瑞士工业协会Swissmem周一表示，全球不确定性正在抑制投资活动。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's weekend announcement that he would increase a temporary tariff on U.S. imports from all countries to 15% from 10% has created more chaos, and the global uncertainty is dampening investment activity, Swiss industry association Swissmem said on Monday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德减肥药CagriSema在临床试验中逊于礼来公司产品
item.description: 诺和诺德周一表示，其新一代减肥药CagriSema在直接对比试验中效果逊于礼来公司的tirzepatide，这标志着在减肥药市场主导权争夺战中遭遇挫折。【原文：Novo Nordisk said on Monday its next-generation obesity drug CagriSema was less effective than Eli Lilly's tirzepatide in a head-to-head trial, a setback in the race for dominance in the weight-loss drug market.】

item.title: 高盛上调第四季度油价预期，因经合组织国家库存下降
item.description: 高盛将2026年第四季度布伦特原油和西德克萨斯中质原油价格预期分别上调6美元至60美元和56美元，理由是经合组织国家库存下降。不过该机构仍维持伊朗供应不会中断的假设，并坚持今年市场将出现过剩的观点。【原文：Goldman Sachs raised its Brent and West Texas Intermediate crude forecasts for the fourth quarter of 2026 by $6 to $60 and $56 respectively, citing lower OECD stocks, even as it continued to assume no Iran-related supply disruption and maintained its view of a surplus this year.】

item.title: 消息人士称，沙特阿美首次向美国企业及印度出售贾富拉凝析油货运
item.description: 据四位贸易消息人士透露，沙特国家能源巨头沙特阿美公司已向美国大型企业及印度炼油商出售了数批来自其价值1000亿美元贾富拉天然气厂的超轻质原油，该公司正准备在本月下旬出口首批货物。【原文：State energy major Saudi Aramco has sold several cargoes of ultra light crude oil from its $100 billion Jafurah gas plant to U.S. majors and an Indian refiner as it prepares to export its first cargo later this month, four trade sources said.】

item.title: 随着美国关税税率悬而未决，经济迷雾再度浓重
item.description: 美国及外国官员、企业高管、分析师和投资者曾开始期待，去年动荡的美国贸易政策反复已告终结。如今，他们却面临着因美国最高法院上周裁决而重燃的不确定性——该裁决推翻了特朗普总统关税计划的关键部分，而特朗普随后又暗示将实施大幅加征关税作为规避措施。【原文：U.S. and foreign officials, corporate executives, analysts and investors had begun to hope the tumultuous U.S. trade policy reversals of last year were finished. Now they face rekindled uncertainty from a U.S. Supreme Court ruling last week that struck down key parts of President Donald Trump's tariff plans and his ensuing suggestion of substantial levies coming in an attempted workaround.】

item.title: 美国关税风波令国债市场陷入迷茫
item.description: 最高法院推翻特朗普总统关税的裁决非但未能缓解市场担忧，反而为贸易政策、美国债务和美元注入了新的风险与不确定性。【原文：Far from being a source of relief, the Supreme Court's takedown of President Donald Trump's tariffs has infused new risks and uncertainties into trade policy, U.S. debt and the dollar.】

item.title: 韩国与巴西同意扩大关键矿产及贸易领域合作
item.description: 韩国总统李在明周一在首尔与巴西总统路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦举行峰会会谈，双方同意在贸易、关键矿产、科技和文化等领域扩大合作。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung held summit talks in Seoul on Monday with Brazilian President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, where they agreed to expand cooperation in sectors including trade, key minerals, technology and culture.】

item.title: 关税混乱的代价
item.description: 韦恩·科尔为您解析欧洲及全球市场今日展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 澳大利亚Lendlease集团上半年转亏，股价跌至近40年低点
item.description: 澳大利亚联盛集团周一公布上半年转亏，受投资物业重估及减值影响，其股价跌至近四十年低点。【原文：Australia's Lendlease Group swung to a first-half loss on Monday, hurt by investment property revaluations and impairments, sending its shares to a near four-decade low.】

item.title: 美国海关机构将停止征收最高法院周二裁定为非法的关税
item.description: 美国海关与边境保护局表示，将于周二东部时间凌晨12点01分（格林尼治时间0501）停止征收依据《国际紧急经济权力法》实施的关税。此前美国最高法院裁定该关税非法，距裁决已逾三日。【原文：The U.S. Customs and Border Protection agency said it will halt collections of tariffs imposed under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act at 12:01 a.m. EST (0501 GMT) on Tuesday, more than three days after the U.S. Supreme Court declared the duties illegal.】

item.title: 对美国最高法院裁决及特朗普新关税威胁的反应
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示，在最高法院推翻其大部分关税决定后，他将把对所有国家进口商品征收的临时关税从10%提高至15%。新关税依据的是另一项尚未实施的法律条款，即第122条。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said he will raise a temporary tariff on U.S. imports from all countries to 15% from 10%, following a Supreme Court decision striking down a large swath of his tariffs. The new levies are grounded in a separate but untested law, known as Section 122.】
